Translations.Text: fekadahunne seb`a semavatin fi yevmeyni veevha fi kulli semain emraha. vezeyyenne-ssemae-ddunya bimesabih. vehifza. zalike takdiru-l`azizi-l`alim
fein a`radu fekul enzertukum sa`ikatem misle sa`ikati `adiv vesemud
iz caethumu-rrusulu mim beyni eydihim vemin halfihim ella ta`budu ille-llah. kalu lev sae rabbuna leenzele melaiketen feinna bima ursiltum bihi kafirun
feemma `adun festekberu fi-l'ardi bigayri-lhakki vekalu men eseddu minna kuvveh. evelem yerav enne-llahe-llezi halekahum huve eseddu minhum kuvveh. vekanu biayatina yechadun
feerselna `aleyhim rihan sarsaran fi eyyamin nehisatil linuzikahum `azabe-lhizyi fi-lhayati-ddunya. vele`azabu-l'ahirati ahza vehum la yunsarun
veemma semudu fehedeynahum festehabbu-l`ama `ale-lhuda feehazethum sa`ikatu-l`azabi-lhuni bima kanu yeksibun
veyevme yuhseru a`dau-llahi ile-nnari fehum yuza`un
hatta iza ma cauha sehide `aleyhim sem`uhum veebsaruhum veculuduhum bima kanu ya`melun
